title: Memory block game
body: A "Memory Block" game, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, is a classic matching game where players must flip over pairs of blocks to reveal hidden images, aiming to find matching pairs by memory alone. The game typically features a grid of blocks, each initially displaying a blank face, and the player clicks on blocks to flip them over, revealing an image underneath. If the two flipped blocks match, they stay revealed; if not, they flip back over, and the player continues clicking to find more pairs.
author: RahulScripted

title: Create MergeSort.py
body:
Merge Sort Algorithm
Merge Sort is a classic divide-and-conquer algorithm. It divides the input array into two halves, recursively sorts both halves, and then merges the sorted halves.

title: Create Algorithm for Optimal Search.java
body: A* (A-star) is an efficient pathfinding algorithm used to find the shortest path between nodes in a weighted graph. It uses two main functions: g(n) (the cost to reach the current node) and h(n) (a heuristic estimate of the cost to reach the goal). A* combines these to minimize the function f(n) = g(n) + h(n), expanding nodes with the lowest f(n) value first. It is widely used in navigation systems, games, and AI, as it guarantees finding the shortest path when the heuristic is admissible

title: Create Image3DHover.html
body:
HTML:

Contains an img tag inside a div container. This setup allows us to apply the 3D perspective and hover effects. Replace "your-image.jpg" with the path to your actual profile image. CSS:

3D Perspective: We apply perspective: 1500px; to the .image-card. The higher the number, the deeper the 3D effect. Smooth Hover: On hover, the image rotates with rotateY(20deg) rotateX(10deg) and scales slightly to 1.05, making it more engaging. Lighting Effect: filter: brightness(1.1); increases brightness slightly when hovering over the image, mimicking a lighting effect. Glowing Border: We add a modern glowing effect to the border of the image container using box-shadow to give the image more depth. JavaScript:

Dynamic 3D Rotation: The JavaScript dynamically calculates the angle of rotation based on where the mouse moves over the image. The closer the mouse is to the left, the more it tilts to the left, and the same applies to the right.
Mouseleave: When the mouse leaves the image, it smoothly returns to its normal position and scale using transform: rotateY(0deg) rotateX(0deg).
author: shitalkarek

comments.body: üöÄ Follow me, üí¨ Join the WhatsApp Group, and ‚≠ê Star the Repo to support our journey together!

title: Create 3D-IMAGE.html
body:
Explanation about the project:
HTML:

Contains an img tag inside a div container. This setup allows us to apply the 3D perspective and hover effects. Replace "your-image.jpg" with the path to your actual profile image. CSS:

3D Perspective: We apply perspective: 1500px; to the .image-card. The higher the number, the deeper the 3D effect. Smooth Hover: On hover, the image rotates with rotateY(20deg) rotateX(10deg) and scales slightly to 1.05, making it more engaging. Lighting Effect: filter: brightness(1.1); increases brightness slightly when hovering over the image, mimicking a lighting effect. Glowing Border: We add a modern glowing effect to the border of the image container using box-shadow to give the image more depth. JavaScript:

Dynamic 3D Rotation: The JavaScript dynamically calculates the angle of rotation based on where the mouse moves over the image. The closer the mouse is to the left, the more it tilts to the left, and the same applies to the right. Mouseleave: When the mouse leaves the image, it smoothly returns to its normal position and scale using transform: rotateY(0deg) rotateX(0deg). Final Result:
On hover, your image will rotate in a 3D-like space, giving it a modern, interactive feel. The glowing border effect makes it stand out, while the lighting and shadow changes create a sophisticated touch. Moving your mouse across the image will change its angle dynamically, making it seem more lifelike. This project is a great way to showcase a profile picture or portfolio item in a highly interactive and modern way!
author: shitalkarek

comments.body: image hover effect even more modern and immersive, we can enhance the 3D effect with lighting, depth, and smooth transitions. title: Implemented the Kandanes Algorithm
body: The provided code implements a function to find the maximum subarray sum using Kadane's Algorithm in C++. This algorithm efficiently calculates the maximum sum of a contiguous subarray by iterating through the input array only once. It maintains two variables: res to store the maximum sum found so far and currSum to track the current subarray's sum. As it iterates through the array, currSum is updated by adding the current element. If currSum exceeds res, it updates res. If currSum falls below zero, it is reset to zero, effectively starting a new subarray. This approach ensures optimal performance with a time complexity of O(n).

title: Age Calculator
body:
An app that calculates the user's age based on their date of birth and the current date.

Features:
Input date of birth and calculate the exact age (years, months, days).
Could include optional features like the time until the next birthday.
Tech Stack: JavaScript (for date calculations), Flask (for backend processing).

**Please assign me this task under hacktoberfest 2024**
